cat.lump.ir.lucene.query

Class LuceneQuerierWT

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.ir.lucene.LuceneInterface
      • cat.lump.ir.lucene.query.LuceneQuerierWT

  • public class LuceneQuerierWT
extends LuceneInterface
    Query into Lucene Indexes for WikiTailor. Given a query and the indexes it returns a LinkedHashMap with the pairs (score, filename) for the top TOP documents retrieved. Also a string with only the IDs of the documents can be obtained with queryIDs.
    Since:
    June 30, 2015
    Author:
    cristina
